model.name: jsonpath
model.title: JSONPath
model.description: Evaluates a JSONPath expression against a JSON message body.
model.label: language,json

expression.description: The expression value in your chosen language syntax

suppressExceptions.description: Whether to suppress exceptions such as PathNotFoundException.

allowSimple.label: advanced
allowSimple.description: Whether to allow in inlined Simple exceptions in the JSONPath expression

allowEasyPredicate.label: advanced
allowEasyPredicate.description: Whether to allow using the easy predicate parser to pre-parse predicates.

writeAsString.description: Whether to write the output of each row/element as a JSON String value instead of a Map/POJO value.

unpackArray.description: Whether to unpack a single element json-array into an object.

option.label: advanced
option.description: To configure additional options on JSONPath. Multiple values can be separated by comma.

headerName.label: advanced
headerName.description: Name of header to use as input, instead of the message body It has as higher precedent than the propertyName if both are set.

propertyName.label: advanced
propertyName.description: Name of property to use as input, instead of the message body. It has a lower precedent than the headerName if both are set.

resultType.description: Sets the class of the result type (type from output)

trim.label: advanced
trim.description: Whether to trim the value to remove leading and trailing whitespaces and line breaks

id.description: Sets the id of this node
